title.narrative: (2020/21 EIPP) National strategy establishment to supply solar energy and foster related industries in Uzbekistan

description.narrative:
(Output) - Analysis of solar energy development of Uzbekistan - Analysis of solar energy development experience of South Korea and its implication - Policy recommendations for solar energy supply and solar energy industry development in Uzbekistan
(Purpose) - Developing policies to supply solar energy and foster related industries in Uzbekistan - Establishing and supplying solar plant facilities in compliance with laws/standards related to plant constructions and facility production

participating-org.narrative: The Export-Import Bank of Korea(Economic Development Cooperation Fund)

sector.narrative: Energy sector policy, planning and administration
